node.title: T20 World Cup semi-final: Blackcaps v England from Abu Dhabi - Live
node.description: Join us from 3am as the Blackcaps hunt a spot in the T20 World Cup final.
node.content: ["Kia ora, good morning, and welcome to Newshub's live coverage of the Twenty20 World Cup semi-final between the Blackcaps and England, from Abu Dhabi's Sheikh Zayed Stadium.", "More than two years on from the heartbreak of that 2019 World Cup final, the Blackcaps and England meet again in a major tournament.", "But much has changed in that time, with New Zealand's World Test Championship triumph earlier this year erasing some of the hurt of Lord's. This clash will give the Blackcaps a chance at revenge though - even if they don't see it that way.", "With four wins on the bounce, it'd be hard to imagine the Blackcaps wanting to make any changes to their side, regardless of the conditions on offer in Abu Dhabi.", "England on the other hand will be forced into at least one change from their last game - a loss to South Africa. Opener Jason Roy has been scratched from the tournament with injury, joining Ben Stokes, Sam Curran, Jofra Archer and Tymal Mills in the casualty ward.", "These two sides last met in a T20 exactly two years ago to the day, where the Blackcaps lost in - you guessed it - a Super Over.", "The winner of this morning's first semi-final will meet the winner of Friday's second match, between Australia and Pakistan, in Sunday's final.", "TAB odds: New Zealand $2.30, England $1.56", "Teams (predicted):", "NZ: 1-Martin Guptill, 2-Daryl Mitchell, 3-Kane Williamson (c), 4-Devon Conway (wk), 5-Glenn Phillips, 6-Jimmy Neesham, 7-Mitchell Santner, 8-Adam Milne, 9-Tim Southee, 10-Ish Sodhi, 11-Trent Boult.", "England: 1-Jos Buttler (wk), 2-Jonny Bairstow, 3-Dawid Malan, 4-Eoin Morgan (c), 5-Liam Livingstone, 6-Sam Billings, 7-Moeen Ali, 8-Chris Woakes, 9-Chris Jordan, 10-Adil Rashid, 11-Mark Wood."]
